message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm willing to put on the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $750,000 is unfortunately below my minimum value for the product.  I'm willing to come down to $850,000, which still gives you a great deal. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $800,000. Can you consider this price?
